devdoc.author: Joseph M. Samake for Consensys Bootcamp 2020
devdoc.details: this contract implements a circuit-braker pattern

acceptWork(uint32,address).details: this fonction receives the ETH amount corresponding to the proposed bounty amount on behalf of the contract

params._bountyId: : the bounty id for which the work is being accepted
params._jobHunter: : the address of the work submitter

acceptWork(uint32,address).return: success: boolean for successful operation or not

activateContract().details: account which deployed the contract is considered the owner thats's allowed to manipulate the stopped state var

createBounty(string,uint256,string).details: fonction is deactivated in emergency stop procedure via the stopInEmergency modifier

params._jd: : The job/work description for the bounty
params._payoutAmount: : The payout amount for the bounty
params._payoutType: : specified if a different currency is used instead of native ETH

createBounty(string,uint256,string).return: success: boolean for successful operation or not

getNumberOfSubsForBounty(uint32).details: WorkSubmission[] is a dynamic array, so we must get length at runtime

params._bountyid: : the id of the work bounty be considered

getNumberOfSubsForBounty(uint32).return: uint32: the number of work submissions for a given work bounty

stopContract().details: account which deployed the contract is considered the owner thats's allowed to manipulate the stopped state var

submitWork(uint32,string).details: fonction is deactivated in emergency stop procedure via the stopInEmergency modifier

params._bountyId: : the bounty id being submitted for
params._workSubmission: : the description of the work proposal

submitWork(uint32,string).return: success: boolean for successful operation or not

viewMyBounties().details: the uint32[] represents the unique id, not necessarily sequential, assigned to each bounty posted by the caller

withdrawMyPayout().details: We're using a Pull instead of Push pattern, allowing job hunters to withdraw their earnings on demand
withdrawMyPayout().return: uint256: payout just withdrawn expressed in unit of currency

devdoc.title: A contract to handle bounties for work items

acceptWork(uint32,address).notice: allows a job poster to accept a work proposal submitted by a job hunter

createBounty(string,uint256,string).notice: Create and post a new work bounty

getNumberOfSubsForBounty(uint32).notice: retrieves the number of submissions posted for a given work bounty

stopContract().notice: Emergency stop contract in circuit-breaker pattern

submitWork(uint32,string).notice: allows a bounty hunter to submit a work proposal

viewMyBounties().notice: retrieves the list of bounties assigned to a given jobposter, the caller

withdrawMyPayout().notice: allows a bounty hunter to withdraw his cumulated earnings

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract only for demo purposes
